channel.title: *Sigh* I need more help
channel.description:
All right, I'm trying to create some Runescape dynamic sigs. I have the function that creates the image with all the data, and then SAVES it in another folder. However, I can't figure out the signiture update function. Will I need to delete the images, and update them myself? or what...
Thanks in advannce :/

item.title: *Sigh* I need more help
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Why would you want to save it in another folder? Either have them accessed dynamically, or use some caching software. Setting up a cron may be easier, but some people don’t have access to crontab.

Read full topic
